title: Asphalt (restored, colorized) (1929, Germany, crime, imdb score: 7.4)

sources.title: Asphalt 1929 Colorized Movie 720p
sources.description: Asphalt is a 1929 German silent film directed by Joe May. The film stars Gustav Fr√∂hlich and Betty Amann and is about a young woman in Berlin who is driven into poverty and steals a valuable piece of jewelry. She is caught by a police officer which leads to the woman to attempt to seduce him into letting her go. The film was shot between October and December 1928 at UFA.
